Wij specialiseren ons in het ontwerpen, installeren en onderhouden van professionele keukens en spoelkeukens ten behoeve van o.a. instellingen, ziekenhuizen, bedrijfsrestaurants, onderwijs, retail, hotellerie en horeca. Metos is onderdeel van de Italiaanse Ali Group, welke met circa 7.600 m…

The Global Key Account Manager will be responsible for some of the most important Key Accounts globally within the Foodservice Europe-Asia-Oceania segment. The Global Key Account Manager will be responsible for developing and implementing a Key Account Plan for the account portfolio. You will focus on strengthening the customer relationship and commercial position, drive profitable growth and increase the share of wallet with the Key Accounts. results.title: Global Key Account Manager for Global Specialist in packaging for Food and Drink
